# MPMediaPickerControllerDelegate

**Protocol**

The protocol you implement so that a media item picker can respond to a user making media item selections.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol MPMediaPickerControllerDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

The delegate for a media item picker can respond to a user making media item selections. The delegate is also responsible for dismissing the media item picker from the parent view controller. The methods in this protocol are optional.

[doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaItem] describes the media items and [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaPickerController] describes the media item pickers.

## Responding to user actions

- **mediaPicker(_:didPickMediaItems:)**: A method that the system calls when a user selects a set of media items.
- **mediaPickerDidCancel(_:)**: A method that the system calls when a user taps Cancel to dismiss a media item picker.

## Responding to media item picker selections

- **delegate**: The delegate for a media item picker.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
